```{r}
# DE Genes for conditions: AM, CMP, Sarcoidosis, Healthy

DEGenesCond <- FindAllMarkers (seuratM, only.pos = TRUE, logfc.threshold = 0.2) %>%
                                      dplyr::filter(p_val_adj < 0.05)


#write.table(DEGenesCond, file= "/Users/immbio/Desktop/Emily/Myocarditis snRNAseq/docs/Markers/DEGenes_condition pos. and neg. AM, Healthy, CMP, Sarcoidosis", sep="\t",quote=F,row.names=F,col.names=T)


##adjust table
DEGenesCond_adj <- DEGenesCond %>% 
  mutate(Gene=gene) %>%
  mutate(gene=gsub("^.*\\.", "", Gene))  %>%
  mutate(EnsID=gsub("\\..*","", Gene))

##GSEA for AM (acute Myocarditis) condition
DEGenesAM <- DEGenesCond_adj %>% filter(cluster == "AM")
#head(DEGenesAM)

egoAM <- enrichGO(gene = unique(DEGenesAM$EnsID),
                          OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db,
                          keyType = 'ENSEMBL',
                          ont = "BP",
                          pAdjustMethod = "BH",
                          pvalueCutoff = 0.05,
                          qvalueCutoff = 0.05)
egoAM <- setReadable(egoAM, OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db)
dotplot(egoAM, showCategory=20, title = "Acute Myocarditis", font.size = 10)
barplot(egoAM, 
        drop = TRUE, 
        showCategory = 20, 
        title = "Acute Myocarditis",
        font.size = 10)

#write.table(egoAM, file= "/Users/immbio/Desktop/Emily/Myocarditis snRNAseq/docs/Markers/ego AM 20.10.2024", sep="\t",quote=F,row.names=F,col.names=T)
```

```{r}

## Volcano Plotes with DE Genes for all conditions: 
# DE Genes: Pos. and negative markers (only.pos = FALSE)
DEGenesCond <- FindAllMarkers (seuratM, only.pos = FALSE, logfc.threshold = 0.2) %>%
                                      dplyr::filter(p_val_adj < 0.05)


##adjust table
DEGenesCond_adj <- DEGenesCond %>% 
  mutate(Gene=gene) %>%
  mutate(gene=gsub("^.*\\.", "", Gene))  %>%
  mutate(EnsID=gsub("\\..*","", Gene))

##GSEA for AM 
DEGenesAM <- DEGenesCond_adj %>% filter(cluster == "AM")
head(DEGenesAM)

# pos. and neg. DE genes for AM
res_AM <- as.data.frame(DEGenesAM)

EnhancedVolcano(res_AM, 
                x = 'avg_log2FC',
                y = 'p_val_adj',
                lab = res_AM$gene,
                # xlim =c(-6, 6), 
                title = 'DE Genes Acute Myocarditis Condition',
                xlab = bquote(~Log[2]~ 'fold change'),
                pCutoff = 10e-1,
                FCcutoff = 1.5,
    cutoffLineType = 'twodash',
    cutoffLineWidth = 0.8,
    pointSize = 2.0,
    labSize = 4.0,
    # shape = c(1,4, 23,25),
    colAlpha = 1,
    legendLabels=c('Not sig.','Log (base 2) FC','p-value',
      'p-value & Log (base 2) FC'),
    legendPosition = 'right',
    legendLabSize = 12,
    legendIconSize = 5.0,
    # drawConnectors = TRUE,
    # widthConnectors = 0.75,
    # ridlines.major = FALSE,
    gridlines.minor = FALSE)


top_genes_AM <- DEGenesAM %>% 
  filter(p_val_adj < 0.05, abs(avg_log2FC) > 1) %>% 
  arrange(p_val_adj) %>% 
  slice_head(n = 30) %>% 
  pull(gene)



```
